summary: This is an email exchange from July 2019 regarding a meeting with an individual named Stan Pottin. The email discusses a signed proffer agreement and requests assistance in identifying communications and physical possessions related to Jeffrey Epstein's associates.

persons.name: Stan Pottin
persons.role: Meeting participant, recipient of proffer agreement
persons.context: Addressed in an email regarding a meeting about communications and possessions related to Jeffrey Epstein's orbit. He is asked to work with an unnamed individual to identify relevant records.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced indirectly as the person whose 'orbit' is of interest. The email seeks communications and possessions related to his associates.

connections.description: The email indicates Stan Pottin is being asked to help identify communications and possessions related to people in Epstein's orbit, suggesting a potential connection or knowledge of Epstein's network.

events.title: Meeting regarding Epstein investigation
events.description: A meeting took place involving Stan Pottin and others, discussed in a follow-up email. The meeting involved a proffer agreement and a request to identify communications and physical items related to Epstein's associates.

keyFacts: A proffer agreement was signed and provided to Stan Pottin in July 2019.
Investigators requested identification of emails, text messages, and other communications related to anyone in Jeffrey Epstein's orbit.
Investigators also sought physical possessions from Epstein, such as cameras or old cellphones.
The email indicates investigators offered assistance with data retrieval for the individual Stan Pottin was asked to work with.
